name: Legitimate Business Inquiry
description: Genuine freelance project inquiry from a legitimate company. Should NOT trigger scam detection.

turns.scammer_message: Hello, I'm looking for a web developer for our startup. We found your profile on LinkedIn. Would you be interested in discussing a freelance project?
It's a 3-month project building a React dashboard. Budget is Rs 5-8 lakhs depending on scope. Can we schedule a call?
turns.notes: Clear project details with reasonable budget

turns.scammer_message: Great, I'll send the project requirements document. My company name is TechVentures Pvt Ltd, registered in Bangalore.
Thank you for your time. I'll follow up through LinkedIn. Looking forward to working together!
turns.notes: Professional closing with legitimate follow-up channel
